villages.name: Rodalquilar
villages.description: Charming village, with a handful of bars and restaurants.  Renown for its local gold mine, abandonded in the 1950s

villages.name: Las Negras
villages.description: Busy village on the coast, with all services

beaches.name: El Playazo
beaches.description: Beautiful sandy beach, one of the finest in the natural park

access.road: Country road with reasonsonable surface, 2km from the main road
access.notes: Can be very busy in the high season, and at times chaotic
